title: ArtyTorrent Pack 75-Loopmasters Raw Power-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 75-Loopmasters Raw Power-WAV samples
-----------------------------------------------------

I&#039;ve been surprised at how popular the rock drum loops I posted have been. Since there is such a demand for them, I&#039;m now posting a special pack for all you rock heads.
If you&#039;ve ever wanted to produce music like Iggy Pop, David Bowie, Blondie, Talking Heads, Radiohead, The Sex Pistols, Gang of Four, Muse, Jonathan Richman, or The Fall, then this could well be your perfect torrent.
Arranged into 5 main sections covering different genres of alternative/indie guitar music, the Loopmasters Raw Power CD offers a range of construction kits and assorted loops that sound very authentic, since they were inspired by famous hit records.
Each section contains loops of bass, guitars, synths, drums and very useful drum fills.
Also included is a toolbox of oneshot sounds featuring guitar hits, feedback fx, synth sounds, vocals and several realistic drumkits.

I&#039;ve removed the REX files, as they merely duplicated the normal WAVs, but a few Reason NNXT and ReDrum patches are included.

All the files - apart from the drumkits which require volume variations - have been normalised and trimmed appropriately, and are presented as 44.1KHz WAV files. The samples are also acidized, with tempo and key information in each filename.

With 930 samples in total, this pack should keep anyone busy for a while.

--
Arty - "Rock out with your cock out"
20th February 2008
